User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user account within the FaustApp application, primarily for authentication purposes. Core data is written once on registration and is mostly read-only afterwards.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user account (matches Firebase Auth UID).

firstName.description: First name of the user. Should not be editable after registration.

lastName.description: Last name of the user. Should not be editable after registration.

firstLoginComplete.description: Flag to indicate if the user has completed the initial profile setup.

Member.title: Member
Member.description: Represents editable, detailed profile information for a team member.

userId.description: Foreign key linking to the User entity.

location.description: Location or address of the member.

gender.description: Gender of the member or team association.

Appointment.title: Appointment
Appointment.description: Represents an event, training, or game in the calendar.

date.description: The date and time of the appointment.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores core user authentication data. Name is read-only after creation. Accessible only by admins or the authenticated user.

/members/{memberId}.description: Stores editable user profile data. Accessible by admins or the owning user.

/appointments/{appointmentId}.description: Stores all appointments. Writable only by admins, readable by all users.
